Locksmith services we cover

Explore the range of professional locksmith services available across our network. From emergency lockouts to advanced security upgrades, learn what each service involves and find the right specialist for your needs.

Search locksmiths near you Browse services by category
Emergency Services Everyday Locksmith Services Security Upgrades & Specialist

Emergency Services

Rapid-response services for urgent locksmith needs

EMERGENCY

Emergency Lockouts

Rapid non-destructive entry solutions when you are locked out of your home or business.

Common Scenarios
  • Lost keys
  • Door slammed shut behind you
Find lockout help by location
EMERGENCY

Burglary Repairs

Immediate securing of property and repair of damage following a break-in.

Common Scenarios
  • Broken door frame
  • Smashed window lock
Find repair services by location
HIGH

Key Extraction

Removing snapped keys from lock cylinders without damaging the mechanism.

Common Scenarios
  • Key snapped in lock
  • Debris in keyway
Find extraction services by location

Everyday Locksmith Services

Regular locksmith services for home and business

STANDARD

Lock Changes

Replacing old or compromised locks with new, secure cylinders (Euro, Mortice, or Rim).

Common Scenarios
  • Moved into new house
  • Key/holder change
Find lock replacement by location
MEDIUM

uPVC Door Repairs

Specialist alignment and mechanism fixes for multipoint locking systems on modern doors.

Common Scenarios
  • Handle sticks loosely
  • Door dropped/misaligned
Find uPVC experts by location
LOW

Key Cutting

Duplicate keys cut for residential and commercial locks, often available on-site.

Common Scenarios
  • Need spares for family
  • Worn out keys
Find key cutting by location

Security Upgrades & Specialist

Advanced security solutions and upgrades

UPGRADE

Smart Locks

Installation of keyless entry systems including Yale, August, and Ultion smart locks.

Common Scenarios
  • Desire for keyless convenience
  • Remote access for Airbnb
Find smart lock installers
SPECIALIST

Safes & Vaults

Supply, installation, and opening of home and commercial safes.

Common Scenarios
  • Lost combination code
  • Installing new fire-proof safe
Find safe engineers by location
BUSINESS

Commercial Security

Master key systems, shutter locks, and access control for business premises.

Common Scenarios
  • Employee turnover requiring
  • High-traffic access control
Find commercial locksmiths

Our AI-powered tool helps you identify the right locksmith service based on your specific situation and location.
